data.text: On Saturday's #JazzDay, join @UNESCO in celebrating the women in jazz who broke down barriers and continue to move us through their music. https://t.co/UKIm75ggFS https://t.co/3VmRlb2WYB

"I was moved by the resilience and bravery of the people of Ukraine. 

My message to them is simple: We will not give up."

#COVID19-related disruptions and lack of access to vaccines has caused a 79% increase in the reported cases of measles worldwide this year.
 
@WHO and @UNICEF warn this can lead to serious outbreaks of vaccine-preventable illnesses. https://t.co/BLkBQlTbek #VaccinesWork https://t.co/nZWr4R3SGJ

After decades of progress, an unprecedented number of people have been pushed into extreme levels of hunger.

UN member countries adopt resolution mandating #UNGA meeting in instances where permanent members of Security Council use veto. 

Resolution comes in wake of Russia’s use of the veto days after Ukraine invasion. https://t.co/5Imy0oXssX
